content: this pattern is also available for free https //www onceuponacheerio com/2023/10/no-sew-amigurumi-bee-crochet-pattern html * i made this amigurumi doll using the yarn under single_crochet 1 technique this technique makes the stitches tighter and appears more aligned * use the ultimate finish 2 to close up the amigurumi crochet in continuous rounds do not join at the end of each round * use a running stitch marker 3 to keep your place when crocheting in rounds * **optional** i used the invisible increase and invisible decrease for a nicer finish * **optional** i made a version using the half-color changing technique 4 see photos for reference * **final measurements** 10 cm approx 4 inches not including the antennas * use different yarn weights/categories and the appropriate hook size for this project to make it bigger/smaller * the arms and wings are crocheted onto the body so there s no sewing involved follow the order of the pattern and make the arms and wings before making the body and head 1 https //www onceuponacheerio com/2022/05/how-to-yarn-under-single-crochet html 2 https //www onceuponacheerio com/2023/04/close-amigurumi-ultimate-finish html 3 https //www onceuponacheerio com/2023/04/how-to-use-running-stitch-marker html 4 https //www onceuponacheerio com/2019/07/half-colour-changes-for-perfect-stripes html
